tosdr.case: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them

title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them
quoteText: Any user generated content submitted through email, Cocoon apps, or social media constitutes Feedback subject to clause 12 and as set out in that clause, becomes property of Cocoon and can be used in Cocoon's marketing efforts. User releases all rights to said content.
